name: Covid Advices Onboarding Screens
description:
Little gift to our amazing Figma community members!


Highlights:

  • 10+ clean Onboarding screens.
  • User friendly interface.
  • Professional Illustrations.
  • Styleguide.
  • 100% Customizable.
  • Renamed layers.
  • Carefully arranged layers.
  • Prototype available.


The story behind this freebie:

Yesterday on 16th April 2021 I was thinking about this dangerous pandemic situation of covid. And I realize that I need to contribute something from my side. but what thing it will be? what I can do?

Then the idea comes to my mind that I need to be alert our mates out there. Then I found these cool Illustrations & made this freebie.


I aim to make this kit is to give you the advice to be safe against the covid, wash your hands, wear masks, use sanitizer, protect your family, stay safe stay healthy!


You can use these freebie components on your personal projects, edit and customize them. but you can't sell them.

these are free for everyone.


For freelance or collaborations touch me here: faiz@chitranu.com


Thank you.
